item.title: Data science: Bank Fraud - predicting using machine learning
item.description: In here we have simulated a situation where a bank need to detect fraud using machine learning, we create 3 ML algorithms (Logistic regression, decision tree and random forest) to improve our results and detect in the mostrly efficient manner we could. In our final model we have the numbers: Accuracy: 0.9994 Precision: 0.9989 Recall: 0.9999 F1: 0.9994, that points to a good model in the fraud detection. item.title: Data science: Songs Recommendations based on spotify dataset
item.description: The goal of this program is to build a song reccomendation program. The program in first place analyze some songs features and how it evolves in time. In a next program we can go deep in this analyzes and see how songs envolves in the history music. The second part of the program has a goal of build a song recommendation. To this goal we used the K-Means algorithm and used the PCA method to decrease the number of variables, the K-Means algorithm needs this reducion.

item.title: Data science: Titanic spaceship - Kaggle competition
item.description: The goal of this challenge is find out who is going to be transported or not transported to a new dimension using the train data. Link to the challenge in Kaggle. I’m trying to solve this kagle competition using ML algorithms and some data techinics. This notes are divided in three parts: Data analysis and visualization Try to predict who’s survive in the spaceship accident Conclusions A prediction using ML in order to find out who is going to be transported to another dimension.
